name: Marcus Bent
description: I’m a down to earth real open-minded, I don’t hide my feelings when it comes to the matters of the heart. I am family oriented person,I am glad for who I am,I have good a Heart, caring,reliable, responsible and I always keep to my word. I am a communicative person and I enjoy spending time with interesting people. I love children very much and it’s always a pleasure to me to play with them. I like Classical music,country music,some jazz,RnB and just bout any kind of music, love fishing, baseball, basketball, football, playing pool, horse back riding, swimming, working out,watching movies,cuddling, being romantic with my woman,am caring, affectionate, trustworthy,loyal truthful man. I am Single,I am somewhat conservative, but am adventurous and love doing things to relax, listen to wide-range of music, watch good movies, love taking walks along the beach or curling up in front of a fire with that special someone. Am a good looking, spontaneous, full of surprises, and very giving.
